Question.Subject: will lockerz ever restock on goods?
Question.Content: i used to get points and stuff for a game i got 100 and waiting still am waiting to know when it will restock but if its a scam im going to ****** loose it that son of a ***** website so yeah plz help
Question.ChosenAnswer: They choose a random dates for the redemption's I suggest you to use LockerzAlerts - http://www.lockerzalerts.com service , they will send you text message to your mobile phone when the redemption occurs ! its also FREE !

Answer.Content: plz go to my profile and answer question about lockerz if you have a time
